content.rendered:
Establish Priorities for Enhanced Company Performance.

Outgrid is a specialized platform for managing performance, which is designed to assist your company in achieving its strategic objectives and retaining valuable employees.

  • Best Products 2023
  • Trending Products
Outgrid is the choice of top organizations

Your people drive the success of your business.

STRATEGIC EXECUTION

Effective strategy execution leads to quick success
Give managers the authority and resources to align employee performance with your strategic objectives.

TALENT RETENTION

Keeping your top employees is crucial for long-term success.
Managers should help top performers grow by providing development plans and career opportunities.

Improve performance by customizing the way you manage and evaluate it.

Support employee development and recognition by giving them clear feedback, ongoing assistance, and chances for peer recognition.
  • Assessment of employee's job performance and progress
  • Coaching conversations
  • 360 Feedback
Discover how to drive employee performance

Clarify aims and give guidance by setting specific goals.

Set unambiguous objectives, agree on priorities, and track advancement across your entire organization.
  • Setting objectives and goals
  • Check-ins with managers
  • Admin reporting
Discover how to drive employee performance

Attain optimal outcomes through improved management procedures.

Assist staff in comprehending their progress, offer continuous assistance, and facilitate peer acknowledgment.
Get Started

Helps organizations undergo cultural transformation.

Set unambiguous objectives, agree on priorities, and track advancement across your entire organization.
337

Performance reviews and check-ins completed

70

Companies that are embracing 360-degree feedback

321

Business grows together with recharge.

930

Revisions made to goals and individual growth plans.

Your business is one-of-a-kind, and requires a tailored solution.

Designed to fit your requirements.

Give managers the tools and authority to drive employee performance in line with your strategic objectives.

Implemented by your managers.

Outgrid’s straightforward interface provides managers with clear value and encourages proactive behavior.

Regarded as trustworthy by staff.

You need to empower managers to drive employee performance while ensuring alignment to your strategic objectives.

You can easily integrate Appraisd with your favorite technology.

Appraisd is compatible with various popular applications including Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zenefits, Bamboo HR, and many others, ensuring smooth and hassle-free integration.
